content.detailedDescription:
My name is joe . i live in the hills above universal city/studio city and north hollywood/burbank california. last evening, at 10:20 pm, i was out on my back deck, taking some windchimes down as a result of the santa ana winds. something caught my eye coming from the north valley. i looked up and saw a huge triangular shaped craft with 3 bright brilliant turquoise/milky greenish lights on each end. each light appeared to have a ring around it. the lights were fairly close together. as it soared above me, the triangle started tilting, and the lights remained on the ends of whatever was flying, so i can tell it was a single craft. i started screaming for my brother, mike and, friend, paul who were inside my home : "omfg!!!!! ufo!!!!! get out here now!!!!!!!!!!!" the lights at the end of the craft started criss-crossing, and making very specific geometric shapes like a light show. it looked choreographed. suddenly, the lights started to go haywire, and the entire craft seemed to just change position and formation. mike grabbed his camera and took some footage as it was flying away, where you can see the lights changing formation. it then took off at great speed over the hills to the south. it returned approx. 5 minutes later, looking much more haphazard, and disappeared once again to the south.  i called 911 and the north hollywood police station. i have never seen anything like this in my life. now, we live directly over the burbank airport, high in the hills. i have seen every type of jet, private plane, helicopter, blimp---you name it. i have never seen anything like this in my life. a giant triangular craft soaring overhead, completely silent, and tilting, and then what looked like to be breaking up of the lights, and multiple light patterns and directions before it sped south behind the hills. i would swear on a stack of bibles that what i saw was nothing but an alien craft. i have no other point of reference to compare this to, as i have never even seen a flying object that shape or lights that color before --almost like a caribbean blue, with rings around them. in the email to follow, please find the footage taken by my brother. again, this is only the tail end of the event, and does not depict the perfect triangular shape which i witnessed first and the choreographed light pattern, before the "break-up" as i refer to it. 

for what its worth, i am an attorney, and my partner is a radiation oncologist at a large southern cali university. in other words, we're "normal" "professional" guys, who are cynics by nature. this experienced has changed my perspective on the entire ufo debate. we are convinced, what we witnessed was not from this earth.
content.summary: Large triangular structure with milky-green lights at each point.

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving on the a11 near cambridge when i looked up and noticed the lights.  it was very large.  there were 2 sets of lights.  the first set on the top of the disc was vertical lines with spaces in between and they made a full oval and were spinning counter clock wise.  underneath those lights were little dots, that seemed like they were turning off and on.

at first i thought it was reflections, but we pulled over on the side of the road and it was still moving.  once we got a distance away i could see the full shape.Im not a big believer in aliens and ufo's but this made me believe.  i wish i wasn't so freaked out or we would have taken a picture.
content.summary: Vertical lights circling with small blinking lights on bottom

content.detailedDescription: When i shot this photo, i had no idea the ufo was in the picture. i was taking a pic of my son at the time, at sesame place in langhorne pa. i was only enjoying a day out with my family, and was surprised to see the object in the photo.
content.summary: I had no idea the ufo was in the picture. i was taking a pic of my son at the time.

content.detailedDescription:
My visiting girlfriend and i decided to take a late night walk on the beach. we parked the car and proceeded down a path towards the beach where the brush was grown up and formed a tunnel about 10 feet long to walk through before opening onto the dunes. upon exiting the tunnel the dunes, beach and ocean become a vast expanse of visibility. 
as we walk towards the ocean we notice how still and quiet everything was. the sky was perfectly clear and the ocean was motionless allowing the reflection of the stars to be clearly seen on the reflection of the waters surface. a few ships lights could be observed on the horizon either coming into or leaving charleston harbor though they didn't appear to be moving. we both sensed an uneasy feeling at the extreme stillness of the night and the ocean and were ready to go back home when we noticed what seemed to be a very bright flickering star very low in the sky over one of the ships in the distance. while we were observing it wondering if it was a planet or what, it suddenly moved left to right from hovering over one ship to hovering over another one some distance away from the first. the movement was almost instant and the distance was finger tip to thumb tip at arms length on the horizon and 3 fingers at arms length off the waters surface. 
the object hovered there for a few minutes then began to meander back and forth when a bright white light shown down to the water. at this point we assumed it must be a search helicopter as it seemed to be searching the waters off the coast. 
as it was doing this it also began to come closer and closer to the shore. as it did it became apparent that this was no helicopter. it slowly moved to within 100 yards of the shore hovering 50 ft above the water not creating so much as a ripple. the reflection in the water was perfect, even the stars could be seen reflecting their light. it stopped directly in front of us and sat hovering there a few minutes. it then moved to the right and sat hovering diagonally from us, still over the water for a few more minutes. it then moved again and hovered over the beach 100 yards south of us as if observing but keeping it's distance from us. it hovered 50 ft over the beach not creating any disturbance or noise. it was an incredibly bright saucer shaped object with colored lights all over it blinking in syncopated patterns that changed when the motion of the craft changed. it sat there for a couple minutes as we stood there in awe of what we were seeing. suddenly it began to move again, this time directly in our direction at the same slow speed. at this point my blood ran cold as my girlfriend screamed and turned to run the other direction. i too turned and took a few steps running away from the craft when i turned my head back to get a look at where it was. it was not down the beach anymore but was hovering over one of the beach houses a couple hundred yards away cocked at a 45 degree angle. a ring of red lights was flashing around the perimeter of the object with all the other lights out. it sat hovering there for a few minutes before drifting off east over the island to be obscured by the houses.
we sat on the beach waiting to see if it would come back. after a few minutes we observed 2 of these objects high in the sky flying towards the ocean in like a formation, one behind and below the other. as we watched them fly out over the ocean they both disappeared before flying out of visible range.  
upon arriving home that evening we called around to see if anyone had reported these objects and found no reports. we chose to not report it at that time. i'm not sure why, probably extreme confusion mixed with a bit of fear. or a bit of confusion mixed with extreme fear. not sure which. it was a profound event which has changed my life in the 29 years since observing it. knowing something trumps believing in something and this is scary knowledge which few people are ready to hear about.
i've never seen a picture or video or description to match what we saw that night. only in the general sense of being saucer shaped. i've been looking now for 29 years and this craft is still unique in appearance and behavior. 
i am trained in electromechanical engineering as well as being a certified lighting designer and an accomplished musician. i also have been a respected salesman in the electrical industry. i served in the army 75- 78 and have a music degree. my musician skills are recognized by many around the world as extraordinary and i currently teach guitar for a living. i was honorably discharged from the service and graduated college magna cum laude and phi beta kappa. i'm known for my honesty and professionalism and this one very strange event.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Saucer shaped with bright lights flashing in sequential patterns viewed from 100 yards away.

content.detailedDescription:
After driving from a state high school track meet with my 15 year old daughter from penn state, i was driving on germantown pike pass norristown heading towards whitemarsh high school with trees on both sides of the road "we" both saw this very small blimp/cigar shaped object fly over about 500-1000ft(apprx). heading southwest(apprx.). since i was moving about 35mph we couldn't keep track of it as we drove it the trees covered it.

i saw this same object near my home in june of 2008 near my home address over island ave and buist less than a mile from philadelphia internation airport.  the object was about 500-1000ft above my car but i could only see it for a few seconds as i was entering traffic and it move southernly toward airport but not sure it stayed on that path but it was ver small blimp/cigar shape and black and quite. i don't recall any lights at either sighting.

i've was a flight operations coordinator in the us army aviation for 13 yrs working with flight plans, flight records and pilots. the first thing i felt was this was very very unusal as if it was either a ufo or a test flight of something that didn't make sense or to be in these areas. the object did move like a blimp in a straight line. no unusal movement.
content.summary: Black blimp

content.detailedDescription: Driving down beechmont ave in on the east side of cincinnati, heading west toward five mile rd from withamsville, i observed an object that looked like it was re-entering space debris breaking up as it came down.  that object split, and became four very bright yellow/white balls of light that formed a triangular shape, and hovered, rotating very slowly in a clockwise direction some distance to the west north west of where my friend and i were driving (i was the passenger).  i did not perceive that the object(s) were descending, but remaining at a constant altitude, though they were low to the horizon from my vantage point, as they were at some miles distant.  the road went through some low areas and the lights became obscured by trees and buildings, and once we reached a hight point in the road again, the lights were gone.  i observed these lights for a full 15 minutes as we drove from withamsville to the outback at beechmont and five mile, my friend and i trying to figure out what they were.  there was nothing on the news about it, and having been a student pilot and being around airplanes, it didn't behave like a conventional aircraft, fixed wing or rotary.  i've never seen anything like this, and i have never really believed that ufo's or extraterrestrials (if this is what it is, i'm not saying that) were real, but its made me think.
content.summary: 4 lights shaped like a triangle hover over east side of cincinnati for 15 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: ..Seen the same thing a few other people seem to have reported on here too! i wasnt the only one who seen this!..Driving into work around 6:25pm working nights in aurora co. turing off chambers rd. turning west onto a side street i look up and west and seen a brite light falling somewhat fast and then it looked to be in a triangle formation of lights as they get lower they then split wide into what looked to be 4-5 brite balls of light the same size and shape they looked to come pretty low and i pulled off the road but from where i was viewing they went out of site..Maybe lasted 10-12 seconds..Looked quite unusual..Keep your eyes to the skys!..Theres something going on!
content.summary: Brite light falls and splits and spreads into 4-5 individual lights

content.detailedDescription: Walking with wife. see orange star like object emerge from south east (high altitude 10,000 ft +) appears to maintain altitude. very slowly moving and occasionally appears to stop moving completely. trajectory aims toward orions belt and passes past about 2 degrees. appears to stop completely for approximately  5 minutes.Floating then  begins to move again back in the direction it came from. suddenly another identical orage star like object (appears from nowhere) next to first one (for about three sewconds) then  suddenly dissappears. then the first one we had been tracking for the past 25 minutes also vanished.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Orange star like object   appeared

content.detailedDescription: I was taking the dog out when i[as normal]looked to the sky and saw two objects,one a plane,flying wsw. the object was lower in altitude than the plane. it flew the same speed and line as the plane. the direction is in line with wright patterson ab. they were flying at a high altitude but i could make the wings of the plane but not the cylinder and the shape was about three times longer than the width. the sun was bright and the object appeared white. the plane left a vapor trail, the object didn't. my thought was,i've never seen two jets flying the same line and then there are no wings on the white object. i don't have any idea that what i saw was made by the government or if it was significant at all.
content.summary: Object was moving in tandom to what looked like a military transport

content.detailedDescription: I was working out in the back yard when i noticed 5 bright lights in a group off due east and about 5 degrees to the north. the lights were visible through a break in the tree line and as i looked closer i could see more off to both sides of the break. i could see at least 9 or 10 lights that appeared to be round and white with a slight bluish hue. they were not moving in a linear fashion as does the air traffic around here but most appeared to be motionless but for 2 or 3 that moved around the others. at this point i wanted a closer look and ran inside for about 20 seconds and grabbed a pair of binoculars. i also called my wife who was in our house and told her to come quick with the video camera. as i started to watch with the binoculars the group arranged itself into v shape or boomerang as above. it remained this way for a minute or two and then the lights dimmed as if on a dimmer switch and became less orb like and more like smaller dots of light and began to disassemble itself into groups.One group of 3 appeared to rotate in place for several minutes while the others began to move off in a north or northwest direction another to the east and another to the south east all moving away from my position. my wife had arrived with the video camera but as i am not very familiar with the functions could not get the night shot function on the camera to work. with the last light disappearing my wife and i got in the car and drove east for about 5 miles where we could see three groups again one to the north one northeast and one southeast after another five miles or so the groups began to move away from us faster than i wanted to drive so we stopped and watched the last group drift of to the southeast and headed back to our house. when we were about 2 miles from the house and heading due west i could see another group of 3 lights off the west of our house.This group hardly moved from where it was at and i watched it for another 20 minutes before heading into the house for supper.There was no sound associated with these lights and except for the earlier brilliance remained constant (did not blink like aircraft navigation lights)
content.summary: Watched goup of ufos manuver for an hour and a half.

content.detailedDescription: Me and three friends hanging out off of county road 640. we saw a giant triangular dark or black object with lights on the points. it came from the south and passed to the east of us. it was bigger than a 10 story office building. when i got home i searched google for quite a while and the only thing i could find was a stealth blimp. if this is a stealth blimp, why hasnt the news reported it?
content.summary: Giant black triangle with lights on tips. stealth blimp?

content.detailedDescription:
I awoke one night in a state of which i can only explain as a spasm, my body was in a state of rigid solid state, i could not move a musle, it felt like something was on top of me.

i fighted to get movement back in my body. i could not turn my head, or move at all, it was like i was having a fight to get control of my body.
after a few panic stricken momentts i could just barely move my finger's , only just a little bit. i then felt that there was more than just a spasm, i felt dirty and touched, it was a horrible feeling from deep inside me. 

then i could just about move my toes, again very very slightly, my throat felt like it was being held, i could feel something was on top of me, my hands where by my side but it felt like they was around my own throat, holding very tightly, i was using all my might to break free from this spasmodic state.

then i swear i could feel something breathing into my left ear, a sound of a growl like noise right next to my ear, i struggled to move my head to the left, like breaking free from a strangle hold.

i could just work out a head , a big long head next to my own face, and as the spasm like feeling started to wear off, a tiny bit at a time, i could work out that this thing on top of me was like a lizard/newt thing, it was like blending in with all what was around it, or maybe invisable, im not very sure which, but i could see it clearly as the seconds passed on.

it was reptilian, i growled at it, or i think i did, my mind and my body gave all it could to do so, i bared my teeth at it, and i could feel it could read my mind, and i was swaering at it, and shouting all sorts of vengence at it, i felt violated and used.

the next thing, which was very very quick, it was off me and was standing to one side of the bottom of my bunk bed, which i had at the time, a light came through the thin gap which was made by the curtains, the light was diffrent shades of a golden light which also had very very small particles inside it, like dust or very very small stars which moved around like little bright lights.

this reptilian creature stood there, i would say about 6 feet high, i could feel it was either proud or happy, maybe both, i tried to sit up as best i could and i spat at it, but the spit just went down my chin, and through my mind i swore at it again.

the creature walked forward and stepped into the light beam, as it did, the feet, then the legs vanished into the light, the more the creature moved forward towards the window, the more of it vanished.

it was gone, i felt relaxed then, but i could still feel where i was held around my throat, i felt i was raped by this horrendous monster.
i awoke the next day, it was bright sunny day, i could hear my mother downstairs, washing up and doing housework, i then didnt move a muscle, i ran the thing through my mond again, and yes i could still feel where i was held around my throat as i lay with my hands down by my side.

i know this happend, my mind and heart and soul knows that this happend, but for the life of me, i could not run downstatirs to explain to my mother about this. who would have believed it, how would my parents have handled such a thing, i did not know what to do.

since that night, my step father passed away, and every once and a while, i always bring up the subject of ufo's or aliens, to see if i hear anything by someone who has experinced anything like what i did, so maybe i could hear of someone else to explain my story to. i aske dmy mother if she believed in aliens or ufo's, she repleid that my step father said once that he saw a ufo in brighton, in the sea in the 1960's, and he swore blind that it was a ufo, but only told my mother this.

i never told my mother about my experince, as i thought it would be to harrowing for her to hear, as if she heard such things from two people who wouldnt never ever tell her a lie , it would be to much for her to take.

what do i do about my experince, i would love to do something about it, if it helps somebody, or even do something fpor the world, as i am being very honest, and things like this should be worked on, and an answer has to be found why they are happening.
content.summary: I had contact with an alien, did not see a ufo, only a beam of light.

content.detailedDescription: Noticed a light rotating in the sky when out for a walk, had binocs and seen a disc with rotating lights. it was c;ose to the horizon lower that a planet, while the stars went through its rotation it stayed in the same spot when i started talking to it , gone in a blink. it dimed down and got bright and zipped off toward the east. it was sittiing in the northern sky above route 23. it has been showing up in differnt segments of the sky since then.
content.summary: Ongoing occurence

content.detailedDescription: More photographs for sighting report 06/08/2008
content.summary: Part 4. sighting 06/08/2008

content.detailedDescription: Photographs for sighting 06/08/2008
content.summary: Part 3 - sighting 06/08/2008

content.detailedDescription:
I was alerted by two boy's who live near by.
they had told me that they were going home, somthing had
scared them. 
they could not tell me exactly what had frightened them, execpt
there was something in the sky at the end of our road.
they said there was a light that seemed to be following them.
they felt, they had to go home & they did not feel safe.
i walked to the end of my road with my camera & looked
for my-self.  
the only thing i could see were two small clusters of clouds
i watched them as they travelled over towards my house.
i could not really make out what they were if anything at all
they drifted higher & were getting fainter.

when i arrived home i put my camera on a tripod & took three
photographs one after another i did not see the line of lights
that move down the sky until i viewed the photos on my computer.

through the evening i noticed & photographed some odd cloud formations. 

the photograph files were taken at: 21.11 & 21.12

i am not sure what they are.
camera i used was a nikon d60 on auto setting.
content.summary: Part  2 - sighting 06/08/08 - v shaped object

content.detailedDescription: I was coming from a client's house off of strausser and turned south onto frank rd. i looked up and i saw what i first thought was an airplane because we are close to akron canton airport and i see many low flying air planes on that street. i usually hear a loud sound when it is a plane and i looked up and noticed i didn't see the usual red blinking light underneath the craft when it is an airplane. i kept looking at the craft and noticed it was not moving. i started to wonder, "why is it not moving? if it was a plane it would be moving!" i got a chill up my spine when i realized i was looking at something i have never seen before something i couldn't explain and possibly something not from this world. it was black or misty grey in color. it had one yellow light on the one right corner and one orange light on the other left corner, which blinked on and off at different intervals back and forth. the tip of the craft was pointing towards the northeast but more toward the east. it was just sitting there and there were other cars driving on the road. there was no sound or noise like a plane and no wind or trees blowing like a helicopter just silence. i was wondering, "don't they see that!?" i immediately turned off at the next side street to the right and pulled over to get a better look. i looked out of my right window and it immediatedly turned all the way north and took off as if going toward the airport. i said out loud, "you saw me looking at you!" i just sat there for a minute and then left.
content.summary: I saw a hovering traingle shaped craft with yellow and orange lights with no sound just sitting there.

content.detailedDescription:
Last saturday night at around 10:30pm i was sitting out on my front porch.
it was up to 85 degrees that day and the house was still warm so i went out
to the porch for a breather.

the best way to describe what i seen was a ball of pure bright white pass
over the roof of my home, float over our driveway and just a couple of feet
over the roof of our neighbor's home across the road and then it completely
disappeared.

i was waiting to hear a crash or something but there was nothing.

you need to remember we live in a wooded area means lots of trees.
how this ball of light managed to avoid trees just baffles me!!

i ran back into the house and woke my husband up and tried explaining what just happened.  he said it was probably a meteor.

i got back into bed and laid there contimplating all of this and i am pretty sure it was not a meteor.

if it was, wouldn't there have been some reddish orange from the heat?
when it hit the ground wouldn't i have heard that or felt that?

by my best calculations i would say the ball was about 2 feet more or less and being completely round.  no sound at all...Just a very bright ball of white light floating.

1.  this happened on saturday, nov. 7th at around 10:30pm.

2.  no storms, no winds, a beautiful clear night.

3.  sitting on the front porch enjoying the evening when a perfectly round
glowing white ball drifted approximately 15-18 feet above the ground.
it had come over the roof of our home from behind and then it came
into view floating completely over our long driveway moving in a straight
path crossing the road and almost hit my neighbors house roof.

4.  once it cleared their roof it vanished.  i mean just vanished!!

5.  the best way to describe this ball was perfectly round illuminating a
very bright white light.  it was moving at approx. 3-5 mph.  slow enough
where i was able to watch it and it's movements.

6.  the next morning i took my camera and was going to walk the path
and see if i could find anything behind my neighbors home, the trees and
the ground.

7.  i knocked on my neighbors back door and talked with both the wife and
husband.  this is where it gets interesting.  the husband told me that about a month ago he was sitting in his front living room with his blinds closed when he seen a round bright light coming into his living room through the living room window.  he then said that the "ball" of light kept moving throughout his home.  he got up and followed the light until he reached the back of the house laundry room and it disappeared.  he thought it was someone with a bright flashlight scoping out his house.  he went outside and started looking for this person.  he found nothing.
this has happened a total of 4 times that he has seen this "light".

his wife seemed upset that he didn't tell her about this, but he said, "i thought i did tell you".  he said he was happy to hear that he was not the only person seeing this and that i actually witnessed the actual object that was causing what he had been seeing.

i asked permission to walk behind their home and look around.  they both
said...Of course and keep us up to date.

8.  as i walked behind their home i noticed too many trees (large) that
would have been very hard to maneuver around.  i did not see any
burnt marks or damage on the ground or on the tree trunks.  i continued
walking down the road looking for anything.  i found nothing.

9.  i contacted our police dept. to find out if they received any phone calls of other's seeing this.  our chief of police said i was the only call. i did ask him that while on duty if he has ever seen anything like this and he told me no....I was the first to report this.

10. what is also interesting is that there is a cattle farm 2 roads behind our home and that is where it had to have come from.

i checked out "lightning balls" and looking at pictures, it wasn't even close to what those look like.

there was no "tail" wind or sound.

since this caught me off guard i didn't have a camera (banging her head)
where i could photo it.  i now have my camera on the front porch and i have
been going out there from 10:00 pm to 11ish hoping to see it again.  the
chances of this sound good since my neighbor has seen the light 4 times.

ok... deep breath....This is still baffling me
content.summary: A ball of pure bright white floating

content.detailedDescription:
I did not see these v shaped object's in the sky, it was later that evening
when i put them on to my computer i first saw them.
prior to taking these photo's i did see odd cloud formations
with lights.  sighting report to follow. 
sighting - over my house.
althought objects were lit up like christmas tree's they were not visable to the eye.
content.summary: In response to the police officers sighting - is this what you saw ?

content.detailedDescription: Walking to a friend's dorm on usf campus i looked up to see what constellations i could spot. it was always difficult to spot the dimmer ones due to a considerable amount of light pollution. the few clouds around were a light orange color due reflecting from the ground. as i was looking at andromeda i noticed something moving southward through the sky. it was what appeared to be an object about the same size (visually) as a low flying helicopter and was moving at a similar speed. it was emitting no lights and was making no sound. what i saw appeared the reflections of the ridges of an object. it appeared to be tear shaped object with bulges. i saw an outline of several curves, the largest of which was at the front (in the direction on motion). it appeared slightly larger than a semi sphere (based on the size of the rim i saw). the bulges gave it the appearance of multiple toruses on their side  which got progressively smaller towards the back. the object also had what appeared to be a rod of some sort under the head pointing forward. the image was dim and seemed as if it was only visible because of reflection of ground sources of light. it was a significantly darker shade of orange than the clouds in the sky. it was also much less defined in shape than the clouds. the edges of the object were not crisp but fuzzy. i stood there watching the object and i thought it was a trick of my eye- an after image perhaps. i looked away to see if i would still see it in the center of my vision (to check if it just was an illusion), but it wasn't where i looked. i turned my head back and it was still there but it had continued moving and was nearing a high cloud. i watched it wondering if it would block out the cloud so i could see a better outline of the object, but instead of flying below the cloud it disappeared behind it.
content.summary: Bulged tear drop shaped flying object seen by reflection of ground light

content.detailedDescription:
I was coming into the house from my back yard when my brother josh saw a bright glowing orange /white bright light in the sky like a star but it was low in the sky above the house tops in the distance to the south. it began to dim to the size of a pin point. still visible, it began to descend down then rise up and descend again repeatedly for 10 min until it disappeared. two minutes later two more of the same objects rose from the house tops in the distance. one stayed in the same spot the original object was at. the second flew about the same speed as a military jet heading west when it disappeared below the trees. the object that remained made the same motions the original one made. it suddenly glowed brightly then disappeared. at 7:30pm a jet took off from selfridge ang that is 3mi south of us and headed west in the direction the light that moved to the west as described above. no other aircraft flew in the airspace until 8:03pm when the same looking jet came back.

i thought it could have been a small hot air balloon but it didnt explain how the one moved real fast in the west direction. i was not scared, but puzzled. they did not make any noise or sounds.
content.summary: Glowing whitish orange lights hovering in sky

content.detailedDescription: Me and my dad had just got done shopping at fry's electronics and just pulled onto the highway. we were heading toward outback to grab something to eat. it was about 5:30 and we were stuck in traffic. i had turned and looked out my window to see two flying objects. it had caught my attention because i have never seen two small orbs turquoise in color pulsating near los colinas, tx. it was getting dark, at least it was dark enough to see them. they were flying in no specific pattern all over the place but never went to far. at first i thought it was two birds because of the swooping manner but then they changed color. they seemed to be pulsating slowly. each orb flew in different ways never synchronizing. the orbs were over some wooded area next to a tall building. i stared at them for about 20 seconds and immediately told my dad to look. he says he saw the same thing as me and was at a lose of words to explain it. i felt my heart beat because i had never seen anything like it. after about 40 seconds the traffic had moved and i lose sight of them.
content.summary: Small round orb

content.detailedDescription: Well, the sound of choppers has me at my window today..  i noticed that the "red" strobe or glow they produce looks strikingly similar to the "redcraft" i record.  today these choppers are acting very strange as you can see..  notice the strobes or lights.. i think they are really just white & red orbs that pulsate that plasma glow, giving the illusion of a helicopter light.  i'm shooting from my house and they are hovering over central park.. i usually run to the park to film but, i'm alone and my wife is to scared now to join me.  these 3 black (ufo) choppers have been flying around just like you see.. today they came our very early, like 5pm.  as i zoom in and at times i look at the "choppers" with binoculars, i can't seem to see the figure.. just the 2 bright lights. nothing attached. other times, you notice the figure of a helicopter...  notice that these birds are not making any noise.. its incredible.. i really think we are being invaded by aliens..  these orbs seem to maybe be the alien.. or maybe they are inside the orb..  the orbs seem to change shape and color, mimicking anything i guess.. i know what a helicopter should look like and the size, and the blackbirds you see are not normal size choppers.. they are huge, almost double the size, about the size of a huge city bus. this is getting crazy. see how they dance and sit, showing off i guess. one even swings by my window i guess to get a look at me..  did you see how near it got to my window............. wowwwwwwwwww
content.summary: Black (ufo) choppers..  orbs/ufos mimicking helicopters.. nyc 111209

content.detailedDescription:
Ok, so me and my friend jonny (actual name) were driving down riverside drive.  we had pulled over to the parking lot of the baseball park right beside the matagami river.  we had noticed some crazy chemtrails going on and wanted to watch.  first there was one that started off ne to sw.  odd thing is the plan spreading the trail went off course.  he turned almost right south.  if you were to take your hand and stretch it out an arm lengths away, put out three fingers horizontally, you'd get were the plane changed course.  a second plane came into the picture about 30 seconds after the first one disappeared.  he was coming from se to nw.  he stopped spraying once he hit the first chemtrail.  a third plane came into view following the same course as the first but maybe 50 miles nw of the first.  it too changed course, the same way and at exactly the same point as the first.  by now we had started driving again.  we came around the bend by pizza hut and jonny noticed a dark grey smoke trail following the second chemtrail but not changing course and staying straight.  he pointed it out and i seen it as well.  it was very odd and we arent sure of what to make of it.  also, while the planes were spreading there chemtrails, it was as if something was following them, breaking through the clouds.  we could not see it, but the clouds were moving apart.  it couldve have been a shadow of the chemtrail on the backround clouds.  not sure though.  let me know what you guys think. i've attached a microsoft paint picture of what it looked like.  sorry no real pics.

thanks,
dave
content.summary: Chemtrails over timmins with other odd things around them.

content.detailedDescription:
The sighting i speak of happens almost every night in murraysville pa.. i am sure mufon has heard about it! how come you guys are not covering this?? there is so much footage it's funny. this is the nail in the coffin.. this is the proof we have been waiting for.. they want us to meet them.. are you guys shills or something? please contact me with any information please!
thank you...
content.shape: Circle,   Disc,   Egg,   Oval,   Star-like,   Teardrop,   Other
content.summary: Major!

content.detailedDescription: It was approximately 6pm i was walking in the lot of our building and saw a bright object in the western sky. thought it was a star at first until it emerged from a cloud and continued traveling from the west to east. it was brighter than venus and did not flicker or flash and traveled in a slight arc from west to northeast. i tracked it overhead for five minutes until it was out of my line of sight. when in my home i told my roomate about what i saw. we were on our porch and i retraced the line of flight and pointed to venus to gives some reference as to the objects luminescence. while on the porch a low flying double engine plane approached from the south flying low and swooped over our place and headed in the general direction that the object had taken. oddly enough this plane did not have it's main bright light on.
content.summary: A flying star brighter than venus...

content.detailedDescription: I was asking prime creator for proof of existance in meditation. i got up and went outside for a leak as i live up on the south face of the mountain at the 3800 foot level and a large white glowing egg shaped craft came in from the west and stoped out over the valley. it was there for approxamatly 3 minutes. it then shot of twards the east out of the atmosfear in what looked just like the enterprise in startrak going to warp speed.  this year i got ahold of the billy meire tapes and i think #3 sanje was describeing advanced et civalizations and their craft. she described to the tee what i saw. mind you i never heard these tapes before this incident. this proves to me that the meire tapes are true.
content.summary: Came into the valley, egg craft

content.detailedDescription: Black choppers making noise outside so i look out with my cam and i catch the same craft from 110209. same blinking pattern. this time it turned white at times..  black helicopters were around looking at time i guess. i ran to central park to catch it doing a couple laps over the park. i've seen this thing fly very low and it looks like its the size of a bus. huge and can mimic planes.. i've seen it turn from a helicopter to an airplane in my face.  it flew very low to me and my wife one time. i think the "black helicopters" are the ufos but mimicking helicopters...  see more from this night at vik456 on youtube..
content.summary: Redcraft reappears over central park 111009 nyc.

content.detailedDescription:
We went to avebury for the day.

on the day i do not remember seeing these objects.
it was last week while looking back at the photo's i noticed the
objects.
content.summary: Photographs: avebury

content.detailedDescription:
It was sunday, november 8th, 2009 and i was walking up to the us marine corps war memorial in arlington county, va. i was approaching the memorial via the walkway leading up from the southwest and looking up at the large flag on top of the statue. while examining the flag i noticed something dark in the sky just to the right of it. shifting my attention to this new object, i saw a black shape like an upside down "l" hanging there in the sky. i stared at this object for several minutes wondering what the heck it could be, and as i watched the l-shape continued to bend at the joint until it was more of a wide v-shape. the object continued to change shape with the angle becoming more obtuse until it was nearly a straight line. simultaneously it seemed to be drifing towards the southeast, roughly following the path of the potomac river below it. 

i had absolutely no idea what this object could be, as it was clearly visible and yet resembled no aircraft or balloon i had ever seen. the weather was very clear and sunny; not a cloud in the sky. the object appeared to be higher than a nearby office building of 20-30 stories, and i estimate it was probably over 500 feet in the air. its exterior reflected the sunlight and appeared bright white as it caught the light along one edge. it looked like it could have been a balloon of some kind, since it was long and flexible, but it was cylindrical and probably over 20 feet long and easily more than a foot thick. the "skin" of the object was black and shiny, almost like a garbage bag or that corrugated plastic drainage conduit you sometimes see in gardens or farms. it struck me that it looked as if someone had inflated a giant balloon in order to tie it into a dog or other funny shape but lost control of it before doing so, leaving a giant tube flying through the sky. it was moving lazily and without apparent control, as if it was drifting in the wind.

there being over a dozen other people at the memorial at this time, i said to a man standing near me, "sir, i'm not seeing things am i? do you see what i see up there? what is that thing?" he followed my gaze and immediately noticed what i was talking about, remarking, "oh, yeah. i see it. what the heck is that thing?" he then walked over to his family who were admiring the memorial and directed their attention to it as well. over the next few minutes they discussed what it could be, with a boy of about 10 years suggesting that it might be a hang glider.

meanwhile, i called my girlfriend who was at home and asked her to go outside and try and photograph the object, as it appeared to be floating in roughly the direction of our home (southeast, towards the pentagon and crystal city.) she tried to do this, but was unable to locate the object in the sky. 

i continued to watch the object as it drifted southeast and passed into the area of sky that the rising sun was occupying that morning. before i lost sight of it in the sun's glare i tried to photograph it with a cell-phone camera, but upon examining the photo on my computer there was too much sun-glare to see anything. i'll attach the photo anyway just in case someone else wants to take a look. the object was visible to the naked eye just to the left of the sun when the photo was taken. if anyone else saw this object i hope they post their own story, as this was during the daytime on a sunday over our nation's capital, so i can't have been the only one who noticed this.
content.summary: Odd floating tube
